Vermont Democratic Party Executive Director Robert Dempsey argued that having a U.S. Senate candidate who until a year and a half ago was a Democrat suggests the Republicans don't have a plethora of candidates. It speaks to their bench, he said. The Democratic Party backed Bernie Sanders in his first U.S. Senate bid in 2006, and since then, he has helped other Democratic candidates.
